cu.explanation_en: Setting Num_Threads_PUSCH to a negative value will cause thread initialization failure during gNB startup.

du.explanation_en: Setting pdsch_AntennaPorts_XP to zero will cause antenna port configuration error and prevent proper PDSCH transmission.
du.explanation_zh: 將 pdsch_AntennaPorts_XP 設定為零會導致天線端口配置錯誤，並阻止正確的 PDSCH 傳輸。
